name: Bioshock Infinite Demade
description: My first 2D game ever, I made it for the Retro Jam but had too much University work to focus on it too much so I only spent about six hours developing it. Think of it as more of a demo than anything. Enjoy two and a half levels of 2D platforming. A and D to move. Space to jump. Left-click to shoot. Right-click to use your special. Have fun.
